anya-e0103n2:1_3: Samaṁ tuṭṭhi, santena, sakena vā tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi, santuṭṭhi eva santuṭṭhitā, aññaṁ apatthetvā yathāladdhehi itarītarehi paccayehi paritussanā.
anya-e0103n2:1_6: Te guṇeti te sīlavodānassa hetubhūte appicchatādiguṇe.
anya-e0103n2:1_8: Te hi sīlavisuddhiyā paṭiladdhamattā hutvā dhutadhammehi sampannatarā honti.
anya-e0103n2:1_9: Dhutaṅgasamādānanti kilesānaṁ dhunanakaaṅgānaṁ viddhaṁsanakāraṇānaṁ sammadeva ādānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:1_10: Evanti evaṁ sante, dhutaṅgasamādāne kateti attho.
anya-e0103n2:1_12: Sallekho kilesānaṁ sammadeva likhanā chedanā tanukaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:1_14: Apacayo yathā paṭipajjanato kilesā naṁ apacinanti na ācinanti, tathā paṭipajjanā.
anya-e0103n2:1_18: Sīlañceva yathāsamādinnaṁ paṭipakkhadhammānaṁ dūrībhāvena suparisuddhaṁ bhavissati.
anya-e0103n2:1_19: Vatāni ca dhutadhammā ca sampajjissanti sampannā bhavissanti, nipphajjissanti vā.
anya-e0103n2:1_20: Yā thirabhūtā itarītaracīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanasantuṭṭhi porāṇānaṁ buddhādīnaṁ ariyānaṁ paveṇibhāvena ṭhitā, tattha patiṭṭhitabhāvaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘porāṇe ariyavaṁsattaye patiṭṭhāyā’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:1_21: Bhāvanā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti bhāvanārāmo, tabbhāvo bhāvanārāmatā, samathavipassanābhāvanāsu yuttappayuttatā.
anya-e0103n2:2_0: Lābhasakkārādi taṇhāya āmasitabbato, lokapariyāpannatāya ca lokāmisaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:3_3: ‘‘Nadiyā kūla’’ntiādīsu viya samussayattho kūla-saddoti āha ‘‘paṁsukūlamiva paṁsukūla’’nti.
anya-e0103n2:3_4: Ku-saddo kucchāyaṁ ula-saddo gatiatthoti āha ‘‘kucchitabhāvaṁ gacchatīti vuttaṁ hotī’’ti, paṁsu viya kucchitaṁ ulati pavattatīti vā paṁsukūlaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:3_5: Paṁsukūlassa dhāraṇaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ uttarapadalopena, taṁ sīlamassāti paṁsukūliko, yathā ‘‘āpūpiko’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:3_6: Aṅgati attano phalaṁ paṭicca hetubhāvaṁ gacchatīti aṅgaṁ, kāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:3_7: Yena puggalo ‘‘paṁsukūliko’’ti vuccati, so samādānacetanāsaṅkhāto dhammo paṁsukūlikassa aṅganti paṁsukūlikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:4_0: Eteneva nayenāti yathā paṁsukūladhāraṇaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ, taṁsīlo paṁsukūliko, tassa aṅgaṁ samādānacetanā ‘‘paṁsukūlikaṅga’’nti vuttaṁ, evaṁ eteneva vacanatthanayena ticīvaradhāraṇaṁ ticīvaraṁ, taṁsīlo tecīvariko, tassa aṅgaṁ samādānacetanā ‘‘tecīvarikaṅga’’nti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:4_1: Saṅghāṭiādīsu eva tīsu cīvaresu ticīvarasamaññā, na kaṇḍupaṭicchādivassikasāṭikādīsūti tāni sarūpato dassento ‘‘saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakasaṅkhāta’’nti āha.
anya-e0103n2:5_0: Taṁ piṇḍapātanti parehi diyyamānānaṁ piṇḍānaṁ patte patanasaṅkhātaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ, taṁ uñchatīti piṇḍapātiko, yathā bādariko sāmākiko.
anya-e0103n2:5_1: Piṇḍapāti eva piṇḍapātiko, yathā bhaddo eva bhaddako.
anya-e0103n2:5_5: Sapadānanti padassa kiriyāvisesanabhāvaṁ, yattha ca taṁ anavakhaṇḍanaṁ, tañca dassetuṁ ‘‘avakhaṇḍanarahitaṁ anugharanti vuttaṁ hotī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:5_7: Patte piṇḍoti ettha vatthubhedo idhādhippeto, na sāmaññaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:5_8: Eva-kāro ca luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento ‘‘kevalaṁ ekasmiṁyeva patte’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n2:5_9: Uttarapadalopaṁ katvā ayaṁ niddesoti dassento ‘‘pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṁ katvā’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n2:6_0: Pacchābhattaṁ nāma pavāraṇato pacchā laddhabhattaṁ eva.
anya-e0103n2:6_1: Khalu-saddassa paṭisedhatthavācakattā tena samānatthaṁ na-kāraṁ gahetvā āha ‘‘na pacchābhattiko’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:6_3: Yo tassa avisayo, so eva samādānassa visayoti āha ‘‘samādānavasena paṭikkhittātirittabhojanassā’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:6_5: Susāne nivāso susānaṁ, taṁ sīlaṁ assātiādinā sabbaṁ vattabbanti āha ‘‘eseva nayo’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:6_7: Taṁ hesa ‘‘idaṁ bahumaṅkuṇaṁ duggandhapavāta’’ntiādivasena appaṭikkhipitvāva sampaṭicchati.
anya-e0103n2:6_10: Tena tena samādānenāti tena tena paṁsukūlikaṅgādikassa samādānena dhutakilesattāti viddhaṁsitakilesattā, tadaṅgavasena pahīnataṇhupādānādipāpadhammattāti attho.
anya-e0103n2:6_11: Yehi taṁ kilesadhunanaṁ, tāniyeva idha dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgānīti adhippetāni, na aññāni yāni kānici, aññena vā dhutassāti ayamattho atthato āpanno.
anya-e0103n2:6_12: ‘‘Ñāṇaṁ aṅgaṁ etesa’’nti iminā ñāṇapubbakataṁ tesaṁ samādānassa vibhāveti.
anya-e0103n2:6_14: Samādiyati etenāti samādānaṁ, samādānavasena pavattā cetanā, taṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etesanti samādānacetanālakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0103n2:9_1: Attanā, parammukhena ca kusalabhaṇḍassa bhusaṁ viluppanaṭṭhena loluppaṁ taṇhācāro, tassa viddhaṁsanakiccattā loluppaviddhaṁsanarasāni.
anya-e0103n2:9_2: Tato eva nilloluppabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhanti, taṁ vā paccupaṭṭhāpentīti nilloluppabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānāni.
anya-e0103n2:10_0: Bhagavatova santike samādātabbānīti idaṁ antarā avicchedanatthaṁ vuttaṁ, rañño santike paṭiññātārahassa atthassa tadupajīvino ekaṁsato avisaṁvādanaṁ viya.
anya-e0103n2:10_3: Aṭṭhakathācariyassāti yassa aṭṭhakathātantiyeva visesato paguṇā, tassa.
anya-e0103n2:10_5: Jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthūti so kira thero nesajjiko , tassa taṁ na koci jānāti.
anya-e0103n2:10_6: Athekadivasaṁ rattiyā sayanapiṭṭhe nisinnaṁ vijjulatobhāsena disvā itaro pucchi ‘‘kiṁ, bhante, tumhe nesajjikā’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:10_7: Thero dhutaṅgappicchatāya tāvadeva nipajjitvā pacchā samādiyīti evamāgataṁ vatthu.
anya-e0103n2:12_0: 24.Gahapatidānacīvaranti ettha dāyakabhāvena samaṇāpi ukkaṭṭhassa gahapatipakkhaṁyeva paviṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:12_1: ‘‘Pabbajito gaṇhissatī’’ti ṭhapitakaṁ siyā gahapaticīvaraṁ, na pana gahapatidānacīvaranti tādisaṁ nivattetuṁ dānaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:12_2: Aññatarenāti ettha samādānavacanena tāva samādinnaṁ hotu, paṭikkhepavacanena pana kathanti?
anya-e0103n2:12_4: Yathā ‘‘devadatto divā na bhuñjatī’’ti vutte ‘‘rattiyaṁ bhuñjatī’’ti atthato āpannameva hoti, tassa āhārena vinā sarīraṭṭhiti natthīti, evamidhāpi bhikkhuno gahapatidānacīvare paṭikkhitte tadaññacīvarappaṭiggaho atthato āpanno eva hoti, cīvarena vinā sāsane ṭhiti natthīti.
anya-e0103n2:13_2: Taṁ pana yasmā tattha kenaci chaḍḍitattā patitaṁ hoti, tasmā vuttaṁ ‘‘susāne patitaka’’nti.
anya-e0103n2:13_10: Vātāhatampi sāmikānaṁ satisammosena patitasadisanti ‘‘sāmike apassantena gahetuṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_0: ‘‘Saṅghassa demā’’ti dinnaṁ, coḷakabhikkhāvasena laddhañca laddhakālato paṭṭhāya ‘‘samaṇacīvaraṁ siyā nu kho, no’’ti āsaṅkaṁ nivattetuṁ ‘‘na taṁ paṁsukūla’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_1: Na hi taṁ tevīsatiyā uppattiṭṭhānesu katthaci pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_2: Idāni imināva pasaṅgena yaṁ bhikkhudattiye lakkhaṇapattaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ, tassa ca ukkaṭṭhānukkaṭṭhavibhāgaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘bhikkhudattiyepī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_3: Tattha gāhetvā vā dīyatīti saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā dentehi yaṁ cīvaraṁ vassaggena pāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ dīyati.
anya-e0103n2:14_4: Senāsanacīvaranti senāsanaṁ kāretvā ‘‘etasmiṁ senāsane vasantā paribhuñjantū’’ti dinnacīvaraṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_5: Na taṁ paṁsukūlanti apaṁsukūlabhāvo pubbe vuttakāraṇato, gāhetvā dinnattā ca.
anya-e0103n2:14_7: Tatrapīti yaṁ gāhetvā na dinnaṁ bhikkhudattiyaṁ, tatrapi yena bhikkhunā cīvaraṁ dīyati, tassa lābhe, dāne ca visuṁ visuṁ ubhayattha ādaragāravānaṁ sabbhāvato, tadabhāvato ca bhikkhudattiyassa ekatosuddhi ubhatosuddhi anukkaṭṭhatā hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘yaṁ dāyakehī’’tiādi vuttaṁ, pādamūle ṭhapetvā dinnakaṁ samaṇenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:15_0: Nissayānurūpapaṭipattisabbhāvoti upasampannasamanantaraṁ ācariyena vuttesu catūsu nissayesu attanā yathāpaṭiññātadutiyanissayānurūpāya paṭipattiyā vijjamānatā.
anya-e0103n2:15_5: Dhutadhamme samādāya vattanaṁ yāvadeva upari sammāpaṭipattisampādanāyāti vuttaṁ ‘‘sammāpaṭipattiyā anubrūhana’’nti.
anya-e0103n2:15_6: Mārasenavighātāyāti mārassa, mārasenāya ca vihananāya viddhaṁsanāya.
anya-e0103n2:15_8: Dhāritaṁ yaṁ lokagarunā paṁsukūlaṁ, taṁ ko na dhāraye, yasmā vā lokagarunā paṁsukūlaṁ dhāritaṁ, tasmā ko taṁ na dhārayeti yojanā yaṁtaṁsaddānaṁ ekantasambandhibhāvato.
anya-e0103n2:15_9: Paṭiññaṁ samanussaranti upasampadamāḷe ‘‘āma bhante’’ti ācariyapamukhassa saṅghassa sammukhā dinnaṁ paṭiññaṁ samanussaranto.
anya-e0103n2:18_1: Aññataravacanenāti ettha yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
anya-e0103n2:18_2: Yāva na sakkoti, yāva na labhati, yāva na sampajjatīti paccekaṁ yāva-saddo sambandhitabbo.
anya-e0103n2:18_7: Tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṁ nāma attano, parassa vā santakaṁ senāsane paccattharaṇavasena adhiṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:18_8: ‘‘Aṁsakāsāvaṁ parikkhāracoḷaṁ hoti, iti paccattharaṇaṁ, aṁsakāsāvanti imāni dvepi atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitānipi dhutaṅgabhedaṁ na karontī’’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttanti vadanti.
anya-e0103n2:18_9: Pariharituṁ pana na vaṭṭatīti rajanakāle eva anuññātattā niccaparibhogavasena na vaṭṭati tecīvarikassa.
anya-e0103n2:18_14: Kappiye mattakāritāyāti nisīdanādivasena, parikkhāracoḷavasena ca bahūsu cīvaresu anuññātesupi ticīvaramatte ṭhitattā.
anya-e0103n2:21_14: Vihāre pakkabhattampīti upāsakā idheva bhattaṁ pacitvā ‘‘sabbesaṁ ayyānaṁ dassāmā’’ti vihāreyeva bhattaṁ sampādenti, taṁ piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati.
anya-e0103n2:21_16: Taṁ divasaṁ nisīditvāti ‘‘mā, bhante, piṇḍāya carittha, vihāreyeva bhikkhā ānīyatī’’ti vadantānaṁ sampaṭicchanena taṁ divasaṁ nisīditvā.
anya-e0103n2:22_3: Niccaṁ antaragharaṁ pavisantasseva suppaṭicchannagamanādayo sekhiyadhammā sampajjantīti sekhiyapaṭipattipūraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:22_7: Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘antamidaṁ, bhikkhave, jīvikānaṁ, yadidaṁ piṇḍolya’’ntiādi (itivu. 91; saṁ. ni. 3.80).
anya-e0103n2:23_2: Attabharassāti appānavajjasulabharūpehi paccayehi attano bharaṇato attabharassa.
anya-e0103n2:23_3: Tato eva ekavihāritāya saddhivihārikādīnampi aññesaṁ aposanato anaññaposino.
anya-e0103n2:23_4: Padadvayenāpi kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena vicaraṇato sallahukavuttitaṁ, subharataṁ, paramaappicchataṁ, santuṭṭhiñca dasseti.
anya-e0103n2:23_5: Devāpi pihayanti tādinoti tādisassa bhusaṁ ativiya santakāyavacīmanokammatāya upasantassa paramena satinepakkena samannāgamato sabbakālaṁ satimato piṇḍapātikassa bhikkhussa sakkādayo devāpi pihayanti patthenti.
anya-e0103n2:23_6: Tassa sīlādiguṇesu bahumānaṁ uppādentā ādaraṁ janenti, pageva manussā.
anya-e0103n2:23_7: Sace so lābhasakkārasilokasannissito na hoti, tadabhikaṅkhī na hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n2:26_3: Puratoti vīthiyaṁ gacchantassa purato gharaṁ apaviṭṭhasseva.
anya-e0103n2:26_4: Pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānanti pesakāravīthiyaṁ pesakārabhāvaṁ nimminitvā ṭhitassa sakkassa gharadvāre pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:26_5: Ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātiko taṁ divasaṁ na bhikkhaṁ āgamayamāno nisīdati, tasmā taṁ anulometi.
anya-e0103n2:26_6: Katthacipi kule nibaddhaṁ upasaṅkamanābhāvato paricayābhāvena kulesu niccanavakatā.
anya-e0103n2:26_7: Sabbattha alaggamānasatāya ca sommabhāvena ca candūpamatā.
anya-e0103n2:29_0: 28.Nānāsanabhojananti anekasmiṁ āsane bhojanaṁ, ekanisajjāya eva abhuñjitvā visuṁ visuṁ nisajjāsu āhāraparibhoganti attho.
anya-e0103n2:29_2: Vattaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭatīti vattaṁ kātuṁ yujjati.
anya-e0103n2:29_4: Tattha pana paṭipajjanavidhiṁ dassetuṁ yaṁ theravādaṁ āha ‘‘āsanaṁ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṁ vā’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n2:29_6: ekāsanikaṁ bhikkhuṁ bhuñjantaṁ āsanaṁ vā rakkheyya, dhutaṅgabhedato yāva bhojanapariyosānā na vuṭṭhātabbanti vuttaṁ hoti .
anya-e0103n2:29_7: Bhojanaṁ vā rakkheyya dhutaṅgabhedato, abhuñjiyamānaṁ yāva bhuñjituṁ nārabhati, tāva vuṭṭhātabbanti attho.
anya-e0103n2:29_8: Yasmā tayidaṁ dvayaṁ idha natthi, tasmā vattakaraṇaṁ dhutaṅgaṁ na rakkhatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:29_18: Na kammamattanoti attano yogakammaṁ purebhattaṁ, pacchābhattañca na parihāpeti, bahuso bhojane abyāvaṭabhāvato, arogabhāvato cāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:32_0: 29.Appaṭikūlaṁkatvā bhuñjituṁ vaṭṭati paṭikūlassa bhuttassa agaṇhanampi siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:32_1: Pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhitabbanti ‘‘ekabhājanameva gaṇhāmī’’ti bahuṁ gahetvā na chaḍḍetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:32_3: Atra atra nānābhājane ṭhite nānārase icchā etassāti atriccho, tassa bhāvo atricchatā, tassā atricchatāya pahānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:32_4: Āhāre payojanamattadassitāti asambhinnanānārase gedhaṁ akatvā āhāre satthārā anuññātapayojanamattadassitā.
anya-e0103n2:32_5: Visuṁ visuṁ bhājanesu ṭhitāni byañjanāni gaṇhato tattha tattha sābhogatāya siyā vikkhittabhojitā, na tathā imassa ekapattagatasaññinoti vuttaṁ ‘‘avikkhittabhojitā’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:35_1: Bhuñjantassa yaṁ upanītaṁ, tassa paṭikkhepena taṁ atirittaṁ bhojananti atirittabhojanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:35_2: Puna bhojanaṁ kappiyaṁ kāretvā na bhuñjitabbaṁ, tabbisayattā imassa dhutaṅgassa.
anya-e0103n2:35_6: Anatirittabhojanapaccayā āpatti anatirittabhojanāpatti, tato dūrībhāvo anāpajjanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:35_7: Odarikattaṁ ghasmarabhāvo kucchipūrakatā, tassa abhāvo ekapiṇḍenāpi yāpanato.
anya-e0103n2:35_9: Puna pariyesanavasena pariyesanāya khedaṁ na yāti.
anya-e0103n2:38_0: 31.Gāmantasenāsanaṁpahāya araññe aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpetabbanti ettha gāmantaṁ, araññañca sarūpato dassetuṁ ‘‘tattha saddhiṁ upacārenā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_2: Yo koci satthopi gāmo nāmāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n2:38_7: Tattha hi ‘‘gāmā vā araññā vā’’ti anavasesato avahāraṭṭhānapariggahe tadubhayaṁ asaṅkarato dassetuṁ ‘‘ṭhapetvā gāmañcā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_9: Nippariyāyato pana gāmavinimuttaṁ ṭhānaṁ araññameva hotīti abhidhamme (vibha.
anya-e0103n2:38_10: 529) gāmā ‘‘nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā, sabbametaṁ arañña’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_13: Na hi so vinayapariyāyike ‘‘araññe vasanato āraññiko pantasenāsano’’ti sutte vutto.
anya-e0103n2:38_14: Ayañca suttasaṁvaṇṇanāti idha sabbattha suttantakathāva pamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_15: Tasmā tattha āgatameva lakkhaṇaṁ gahetabbanti dassento ‘‘taṁ āropitena ācariyadhanunā’’tiādinā minanavidhiṁ āha.
anya-e0103n2:39_0: Tato tato magganti tattha tattha khuddakamaggaṁ pidahati.
anya-e0103n2:39_2: Yathāparicchinne kāleti ukkaṭṭhassa tayopi utū, majjhimassa dve, mudukassa eko utu.
anya-e0103n2:39_4: Nipajjitvā gamissāmāti cittassa sithilabhāvena dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjatīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:39_5: Araññasaññaṁ manasi karontoti ‘‘ahaṁ vivekavāsaṁ vasissāmi, yathāladdhova kāyaviveko sātthako kātabbo’’ti manasikārasabbhāvato ‘‘bhabbo…pe…
anya-e0103n2:39_7: Assa āraññikassa cittaṁ na vikkhipanti āpāthamanupagamanato.
anya-e0103n2:39_9: Jīvitanikantiṁ jahati bahuparissaye araññe nivāseneva maraṇabhayassa dūrīkaraṇato.
anya-e0103n2:39_12: Yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipattiyā vivekassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato āraññikaṅgayogino vāhanasadisanti katvā vuttaṁ ‘‘avasesadhutāyudho’’ti, avasiṭṭhadhutadhammāyudhoti attho.
anya-e0103n2:42_2: Tattha hi tesaṁ rājūnaṁ balakāyo upagantvā antarantarā yuddhaṁ kareyya, corāpi pāripanthikā samosarantā bhikkhussa sukhena nisīdituṁ na denti.
anya-e0103n2:42_3: Cetiyarukkho ‘‘devatādhiṭṭhito’’ti manussehi sammatarukkho pūjetuṁ upagatehi manussehi avivitto hoti.
anya-e0103n2:42_6: Sīmantarikarukkhādayo saparissayā, dullabhavivekā cāti āha ‘‘ime rukkhe vivajjetvā’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:43_0: Abhiṇhaṁ tarupaṇṇavikāradassanenāti abhikkhaṇaṁ tarūsu, tarūnaṁ vā paṇṇesu vikārassa khaṇabhaṅgassa dassanena.
anya-e0103n2:43_3: Tāpi hi rukkhaṭṭhavimānesu vasantiyo rukkhesu vasanti.
anya-e0103n2:43_8: Abhirattāni taruṇakāle, nīlāni majjhimakāle, paṇḍūni jiṇṇakāle.
anya-e0103n2:43_10: Evaṁ passanto tarupaṇṇāni paccakkhato eva niccasaññaṁ panūdati pajahati, aniccasaññā evassa saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0103n2:43_11: Yasmā bhagavato jātibodhidhammacakkapavattanaparinibbānāni rukkhamūleyeva jātāni, tasmā vuttaṁ ‘‘buddhadāyajjaṁ rukkhamūla’’nti.
anya-e0103n2:46_1: ‘‘Rukkhamūlaṁ paṭikkhipāmī’’ti ettake vutte channaṁ appaṭikkhittameva hotīti ‘‘channañcarukkhamūlañca paṭikkhipāmī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:46_2: Dhutaṅgassa sabbaso paṭiyogipaṭikkhepena hi samādānaṁ ijjhati, no aññathāti.
anya-e0103n2:46_3: ‘‘Dhammassavanāyā’’ti imināva dhammaṁ kathentenāpi uposathadivasādīsu suṇantānaṁ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṁ tehi yācitena channaṁ pavisituṁ vaṭṭati, dhammaṁ pana kathetvā abbhokāsova gantabbo.
anya-e0103n2:46_8: Maggamajjhe ṭhitaṁ sālanti sīhaḷadīpe viya maggā anokkamma ujukameva pavisitabbasālaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:46_10: Yāva vassūparamā ṭhatvā gantabbaṁ, na tāva dhutaṅgabhedo hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:47_2: Acchannamariyādanti yathā vassodakaṁ anto na pavisati, evaṁ chadanasaṅkhepena upari akatamariyādaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:47_3: Anto pana pabbhārassa vassodakaṁ pavisati ce, abbhokāsasaṅkhepamevāti tattha pavisituṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0103n2:48_0: Paviṭṭhakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati yathāvuttapabbhārādike ṭhapetvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:48_1: Jānitvāti dhammassavanādiatthaṁ channaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pavisitvā nisinno ‘‘idāni aruṇo uṭṭhahatī’’ti jānitvā.
anya-e0103n2:48_2: Rukkhamūlepi katthaci attheva nivāsaphāsukatāti siyā tattha āsaṅgapubbako āvāsapalibodho, na pana abbhokāseti idheva āvāsapalibodhupacchedo ānisaṁso vutto.
anya-e0103n2:48_5: Asukadisāya vasanaṭṭhānaṁ natthi, tasmā tattha gantuṁ neva sakkāti edisassa parivitakkassa abhāvato cātuddiso.
anya-e0103n2:51_2: Na tatthāti ‘‘susāna’’nti vavatthapitamatte ṭhāne na vasitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:52_0: Sosānikena nāma appakiccena sallahukavuttinā bhavitabbanti dassetuṁ ‘‘tasmiṁ pana vasantenā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:52_3: Tattha uppannaparissayavighātatthāyāti ‘‘susānaṁ nāma manussarāhasseyyaka’’nti corā katakammāpi akatakammāpi osaranti, tattha coresu bhaṇḍasāmike disvā bhikkhusamīpe bhaṇḍaṁ chaḍḍetvā palātesu manussā bhikkhuṁ ‘‘coro’’ti gahetvā potheyyuṁ, tasmā vihāre saṅghattheraṁ vā gocaragāme raññā niyuttaṁ rājayuttakaṁ vā attano sosānikabhāvaṁ jānāpetvā yathā tādiso, añño vā parissayo na hoti, tathā appamattena vasitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:52_4: Caṅkamantassa yadā āḷahanaṁ abhimukhaṁ na hoti, tadāpi saṁvegajananatthaṁ tattha diṭṭhi vissajjetabbāti dassetuṁ ‘‘addhakkhikena āḷahanaṁ olokentenā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:53_1: Ārammaṇanti tasmiṁ susāne ‘‘ayaṁ vammiko, ayaṁ rukkho, ayaṁ khāṇuko’’tiādinā divāyeva ārammaṇaṁ vavatthapetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:53_3: Kenaci leḍḍupāsāṇādinā āsanne vicarantīti na paharitabbā.
anya-e0103n2:53_7: Kulagehaṁ na pavisitabbanti petadhūmena vāsitattā, pisācānubandhattā ca kulagehassa abbhantaraṁ na pavisitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:53_9: Matañātakānaṁ tattha gantvā devasikaṁ rodanaṁ dhuvarodanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:54_6: Byādhikānaṁ, jarājiṇṇānañca matānaṁ tattha dassanena ārogyayobbanajīvitamadappahānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:54_7: Khuddakassa, mahato ca bhayassa abhibhavanato bhayabheravasahanatā.
anya-e0103n2:54_8: Saṁviggassa yoniso padahanaṁ sambhavatīti amanussānaṁ garubhāvanīyatā.
anya-e0103n2:57_1: Senāsanagāhaṇe pare uṭṭhāpetvā gahaṇaṁ, ‘‘idaṁ sundaraṁ, idaṁ na sundara’’nti paritulayitvā pucchanā, olokanā ca senāsanaloluppaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:57_3: Vihārassa pariyantabhāvena dūreti vā bahūnaṁ sannipātaṭṭhānādīnaṁ accāsanneti vā pucchituṁ na labhati, pucchanenapissa dhutaṅgassa saṁkilissanato.
anya-e0103n2:57_5: Sacassa taṁ na ruccatīti assa yathāsanthatikassa taṁ yathāgāhitaṁ senāsanaṁ aphāsukabhāvena sace na ruccati, mudukassa asati roge yathāgāhitaṁ pahāya aññassa senāsanassa gahaṇaṁ loluppaṁ, majjhimassa gantvā olokanā, ukkaṭṭhassa pucchanā.
anya-e0103n2:61_3: ‘‘Nesajjiko’’ti ca sayanaṁ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya eva viharituṁ sīlamassāti imassa atthassa idha adhippetattā seyyā evettha paṭiyoginī, na itare tathā aniṭṭhattā, asambhavato ca.
anya-e0103n2:61_4: Kosajjapakkhiyo hi iriyāpatho idha paṭiyogibhāvena icchito, na itare.
anya-e0103n2:61_5: Na ca sakkā ṭhānagamanehi vinā nisajjāya eva yāpetuṁ tathā pavattetunti seyyāvettha paṭiyoginī.
anya-e0103n2:62_0: Cattāro pādā, piṭṭhiapassayo cāti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi pañcaṅgo.
anya-e0103n2:62_1: Catūhi aṭṭanīhi, piṭṭhiapassayena ca pañcaṅgoti apare.
anya-e0103n2:62_2: Ubhosu passesu piṭṭhipasse ca yathāsukhaṁ apassāya viharato nesajjikassa ‘‘anesajjikato ko viseso’’ti gāhaṁ nivāretuṁ abhayatthero nidassito ‘‘thero anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyī’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:63_0: Upacchedīyati etenāti upacchedananti vinibandhupacchedassa sādhakatamabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n2:66_1: Sekkhaputhujjanānaṁ vasena siyā kusalāni, khīṇāsavānaṁ vasena siyā abyākatāni.
anya-e0103n2:66_2: Tattha sekkhaputhujjanā paṭipattipūraṇatthaṁ, khīṇāsavā phāsuvihāratthaṁ dhutaṅgāni pariharanti.
anya-e0103n2:66_3: Akusalampi dhutaṅganti akusalacittenāpi dhutaṅgasevanā atthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:66_4: Taṁ na yuttaṁ, yena akusalacittena pabbajitassa āraññikattaṁ, taṁ dhutaṅgaṁ nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n2:66_6: Yaṁ hidaṁ kilesānaṁ dhunanato dhutassa puggalassa, ñāṇassa, cetanāya vā aṅgattaṁ, na taṁ akusaladhammesu sambhavati.
anya-e0103n2:66_7: Tasmā araññavāsādimattena āraññikādayo tāva hontu, āraññikaṅgādīni pana na hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘na maya’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:66_10: Na ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti, kilesānaṁ dhunanaṭṭhenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:66_11: Yassa bhikkhuno etāni samādānāni aṅgāni, etena paṭhamenāpi atthavikappena ‘‘natthi akusalaṁ dhutaṅga’’nti dasseti.
anya-e0103n2:66_12: Na ca akusalaṁ kiñci dhunātīti akusalaṁ kiñci pāpaṁ na ca dhunāti eva appaṭipakkhato.
anya-e0103n2:66_13: Yesaṁ samādānānaṁ taṁ akusalaṁ ñāṇaṁ viya aṅganti katvā tāni dhutaṅgānīti vucceyyuṁ.
anya-e0103n2:66_14: Iminā dutiyenāpi atthavikappena ‘‘natthi akusalaṁ dhutaṅga’’nti dasseti.
anya-e0103n2:67_1: Te hi dhutaṅgaṁ nāma paññattīti vadanti.
anya-e0103n2:67_2: Tathā sati tassa paramatthato avijjamānattā kilesānaṁ dhunanaṭṭhopi na siyā, samādātabbatā cāti tesaṁ vacanaṁ pāḷiyā virujjhatīti dassetuṁ ‘‘kusalattikavinimutta’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:67_3: Tasmāti yasmā paññattipakkhe ete dosā dunnivārā, tasmā taṁ tesaṁ vacanaṁ na gahetabbaṁ, vuttanayo cetanāpakkhoyeva gahetabboti attho.
anya-e0103n2:67_4: Yasmā ete dhutaguṇā kusalattike paṭhamatatiyapadasaṅgahitā, tasmā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā asaṁkiliṭṭhasaṁkilesikāti evaṁ sesatikadukapadehipi nesaṁ yathārahaṁ saṅgaho vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0103n2:68_0: Kāmaṁ sabbopi arahā dhutakileso, idha pana dhutaṅgasevanāmukhena kilese vidhunitvā ṭhito khīṇāsavo ‘‘dhutakileso puggalo’’ti adhippeto.
anya-e0103n2:68_1: Tathā sabbopi ariyamaggo nippariyāyena kilesadhunano dhammo, visesato aggamaggo.
anya-e0103n2:68_4: Evaṁ dhutaṁ dassetvā dhutavāde dassetabbe yasmā dhutavādabhedena dhuto viya dhutabhedena dhutavādopi duvidho, tasmā tesaṁ, tadubhayapaṭikkhepassa ca vasena catukkamettha sambhavatīti taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘atthi dhuto’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:69_1: Dhutadhammā nāmāti dhutaṅgasevanāya paṭipakkhabhūtānaṁ pāpadhammānaṁ dhunanavasena pavattiyā ‘‘dhuto’’ti laddhanāmāya dhutaṅgacetanāya upakārakā dhammāti katvā dhutadhammā nāma.
anya-e0103n2:69_2: Asampattasampattesu paccayesu alubbhanākārena pavattanato appicchatā santuṭṭhitā ca atthato alobho.
anya-e0103n2:69_3: Paccayagedhādihetukānaṁ lolatādīnaṁ saṁkilesānaṁ sammadeva likhanato chedanato gaṇasaṅgaṇikādibhedato saṁsaggato cittassa vivecanato sallekhatā pavivekatā ca alobho amohoti imesu dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti tadantogadhā tappariyāpannā honti, tadubhayasseva pavattivisesabhāvato.
anya-e0103n2:69_4: Imehi kusaladhammehi atthī idamatthī, yena ñāṇena pabbajitena nāma paṁsukūlikaṅgādīsu patiṭṭhitena bhavitabbanti yathānusiṭṭhaṁ dhutaguṇe samādiyati ceva pariharati ca, taṁ ñāṇaṁ idamatthitā.
anya-e0103n2:69_6: Paṭikkhepavatthūsūti gahapaticīvarādīsu tehi tehi dhutaṅgehi paṭikkhipitabbavatthūsu.
anya-e0103n2:69_12: Atisallekhamukhenāti ativiya sallekhapaṭipattimukhena, ukkaṭṭhassa vattanakānampi paṭikkhipanavasenāti attho.
anya-e0103n2:70_0: Sukhumakaraṇasannissayo rāgo dukkhāya paṭipattiyā patiṭṭhaṁ na labhatīti āha ‘‘dukkhāpaṭipadañca nissāya rāgo vūpasammatī’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:70_1: Sallekho nāma sampajānassa hoti, satisampajaññe moho apatiṭṭhova appamādasambhavatoti vuttaṁ ‘‘sallekhaṁ nissāya appamattassa moho pahīyatī’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:71_0: Sīsaṅgānīti sīsabhūtāni aṅgāni, paresampi kesañci nānantarikatāya, sukaratāya ca saṅgaṇhanato uttamaṅgānīti attho.
anya-e0103n2:71_1: Asambhinnaṅgānīti kehici sambhedarahitāni, visuṁyeva aṅgānīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n2:71_2: Kammaṭṭhānaṁ vaḍḍhati rāgacaritassa mohacaritassa dosacaritassāpi, taṁ ekaccaṁ dhutaṅgaṁ sevantassāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:71_6: Ekameva hi dhutaṅgaṁ yathā kilesadhunanaṭṭhena, evaṁ cetanāsabhāvattā.
anya-e0103n2:72_0: Terasāpi dhutaṅgāni samādāya pariharantānaṁ puggalānaṁ vasena ‘‘dvācattālīsa hontī’’ti vatvā bhikkhūnaṁ terasannampi pariharaṇassa ekajjhaṁyeva sambhavaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sace hī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:72_4: 1.32) vacanato channe aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpitamatte dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati, na abbhokāse, tasmā bhedahetuno abhāvena tampi arogameva.
anya-e0103n2:72_8: Pavāritāya hi bhikkhuniyā atirittaṁ katvā bhuñjituṁ na labbhati.
anya-e0103n2:72_9: Kappiye ca vatthusmiṁ lolatāpahānāya dhutaṅgasamādānaṁ, na akappiye, sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhittattā.
anya-e0103n2:72_10: Aṭṭheva honti bhikkhuniyā saṁkaccikacīvarādīhi saddhiṁ pañcapi ticīvarasaṅkhameva gacchantīti katvā.
anya-e0103n2:72_11: Yathāvuttesūti bhikkhūnaṁ vuttesu terasasu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṁ dvādasa sāmaṇerānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:72_12: Sattāti bhikkhunīnaṁ vuttesu aṭṭhasu ekaṁ pahāya satta ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato.
anya-e0103n2:72_13: ‘‘Ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅga’’nti hi imaṁ anuvattamānameva katvā ‘‘satta sikkhamānasāmaṇerīna’’nti vuttaṁ.
